Interface API

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BanHandler

    public interface API

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean banPlayer(String playerName, String senderName, String reason, long banLength, boolean notify)
      Ban a player from the server.
      List<BanRecord> getPlayerBans(String playerName)
      Gets all bans made against a player.

    • Method Detail

      • banPlayer

        boolean banPlayer(String playerName,
                String senderName,
                String reason,
                long banLength,
                boolean notify)
        Ban a player from the server.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player to ban
        senderName - the name of the player/plugin requesting the ban
        reason - the reason for the ban
        banLength - the length of the ban in milliseconds
        notify - if true, broadcast a message to notify players
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • pardonPlayer

        boolean pardonPlayer(String playerName,
                   String senderName,
                   boolean notify)
        Pardon a player and allow them to login to the server again
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player to pardon
        senderName - the name of the player/plugin requesting the pardon
        notify - if true, broadcast a message to notify players
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • isPlayerBanned

        boolean isPlayerBanned(String playerName)
        Checks if a player is currently banned.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player
        Returns:
        true, if is player banned

      • getPlayerBans

        List<BanRecord> getPlayerBans(String playerName)
        Gets all bans made against a player.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player
        Returns:
        the player's bans
